works.title: Next E-commerce Dashboard Admin
works.description: The project contains both frontend and backend code for a full-stack e-commerce platform connected to a frontend store. The application includes a navigation bar to switch between different sections and segments of the e-commerce administrator panel. It allows for the management of products in the shop, including adding categories, colors, product sizes, and billboards to change and display in the shop. Additionally, it displays both rejected and approved orders, provides a summary of total sales, number of sales, and available products, and includes a sales graph for better visual representation.
works.techs: TypeScript, NextJs, Zustand, React Hooks Form, Cloudinary, Tailwind, MySQL, Prisma

works.title: Next E-commerce Store
works.description: This is an online shop that is connected to an administrator dashboard. The shop has a navigation bar that allows users to switch between different categories of products. Each product has a modal preview and a product detail page. The shop also provides filtering options within each category based on colors and sizes. Lastly, the website has a checkout and payment gateway integrated to ensure a seamless purchase process.
works.techs: TypeScript, ReactJs, NextJs, Stripe, Tailwind, Rechart

works.title: Nike landing page
works.description: This landing page is a side project created for freelancers who need to establish an online presence to showcase their products and services. It boasts an impressive assortment of Nike products and offers essential information about the shop. You can easily access the latest sports footwear, apparel, and accessories while getting all the important details about the shop.
works.techs: Javascript, React JS, Tailwind CSS, UI Design

works.title: Video games App
works.description: A Full Stack Web Application dedicated to video games, allows users to explore and discover information about various video games through an intuitive UI.
works.techs: Javascript, React, Redux, Css, Node.js, Express, Sequelize

works.title: TicketShow
works.description: This is a ticket-selling application for events that features payment gateway integration, local and third-party authentication, combined filters, a review/rating system, and an administration dashboard. The application was created to support emerging artists in promoting their events.
works.techs: Javascript, React, Redux, Tailwind, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Figma, Firebase

works.title: Rick & Morty App
works.description: The Rick and Morty app is a user-friendly platform that enables fans of the series to explore various details about the show's characters and locations. With an intuitive interface, users can effortlessly navigate through the app and discover interesting facts about their favorite characters.
works.techs: Javascript, React, Redux, Css, Node.js, Express, Sequelize

works.title: The Weather App
works.description: I created a weather app for any city in the world. Highly recommended in the front-end community, I was intrigued and took up the challenge. Here's the final product.
